InstallationÂ¶

Pyspatialml is available on PyPI and can be installed in the usual manner with:

pip install Pyspatialml

The development version, which is more up-to-date with changes to the package especially during these earlier stages of development, can be installed directly via:

pip install git+https://github.com/stevenpawley/Pyspatialml
